entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
